duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute sales account plans with a focus on new business-to-business account development and residual income.
Prospect and cold call potential customers, and cultivate customer base with recurring sales.
Promote and sell products and services, emphasizing product features based on customer needs and technical knowledge.
Assist customers with cost savings initiatives and plan sales and gross profit goals for each key account.
Develop high potential prospects to guarantee future sales growth through quality sales calls.
Demonstrate a sense of urgency when addressing customer inquiries, utilizing internal resources, and closing sales.
Implement consultative solutions selling to meet customer needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
